ProjectTitle: GIVAM - Simulation of the total gut by in vitro animal models targeting specific monogastrics to allow rational feed design: the case of alternative protein sources
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/01/2024
Metadata: please describe the metadata that you will use for your data underlying the publications; peer reviewed publications in lirias do not fall under the scope of a DMP. For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: please note that Lirias is not suitable for data sharing, you can use KU Leuven RDR instead, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr. For sequencing data a disciplinary repository may be more suitable, have a look at EBI for example (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/)
label: good with suggestions
